trans-unit.source: Protect devices | Microsoft Intune
trans-unit.target: Protect devices | Microsoft Intune

trans-unit.source: Learn about some of the ways that Intune can help you protect your devices against unauthorized access and other threats.
trans-unit.target: Learn about some of the ways that Intune can help you protect your devices against unauthorized access and other threats.

trans-unit.source: Protect devices with Microsoft Intune
trans-unit.target: Protect devices with Microsoft Intune

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Intune offers a full set of capabilities to help you protect the devices you manage, and the data stored on those devices.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Intune offers a full set of capabilities to help you protect the devices you manage, and the data stored on those devices.

trans-unit.source: Read this topic to learn the basics of these capabilities and to find out how to learn more.
trans-unit.target: Read this topic to learn the basics of these capabilities and to find out how to learn more.

trans-unit.source: General ways to protect all devices
trans-unit.target: General ways to protect all devices

trans-unit.source: Device configuration
trans-unit.target: Device configuration

trans-unit.source: Intune [configuration policies](manage-settings-and-features-on-your-devices-with-microsoft-intune-policies.md), help you protect and configure devices by controlling a multitude of settings and features.
trans-unit.target: Intune [configuration policies](manage-settings-and-features-on-your-devices-with-microsoft-intune-policies.md), help you protect and configure devices by controlling a multitude of settings and features.

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: For example:

trans-unit.source: You can restrict use of hardware features on the device such as the camera, or Bluetooth.
trans-unit.target: You can restrict use of hardware features on the device such as the camera, or Bluetooth.

trans-unit.source: You can configure compliant and noncompliant apps.
trans-unit.target: You can configure compliant and noncompliant apps.

trans-unit.source: You will be alerted if a noncompliant app is installed (and some platforms can actually block the install).
trans-unit.target: You will be alerted if a noncompliant app is installed (and some platforms can actually block the install).

trans-unit.source: Reset passcodes when users are locked out of their devices
trans-unit.target: Reset passcodes when users are locked out of their devices

trans-unit.source: Since the first step in protecting company data on mobile devices is to require a passcode to use the device, sometimes you have to [reset a passcode](use-remote-lock-and-passcode-reset-in-microsoft-intune.md) or help an employee do so, either by removing the passcode or setting a temporary passcode remotely.
trans-unit.target: Since the first step in protecting company data on mobile devices is to require a passcode to use the device, sometimes you have to [reset a passcode](use-remote-lock-and-passcode-reset-in-microsoft-intune.md) or help an employee do so, either by removing the passcode or setting a temporary passcode remotely.

trans-unit.source: You can also [lock a device remotely](use-remote-lock-and-passcode-reset-in-microsoft-intune.md) if it is lost or stolen.
trans-unit.target: You can also [lock a device remotely](use-remote-lock-and-passcode-reset-in-microsoft-intune.md) if it is lost or stolen.

trans-unit.source: Retire devices and remove data
trans-unit.target: Retire devices and remove data

trans-unit.source: When a device needs to be [removed from Intune management](retire-devices-from-microsoft-intune-management) (for example, a user leaves, or the device is lost or stolen), it's likely that you will want to remove data from that device.
trans-unit.target: When a device needs to be [removed from Intune management](retire-devices-from-microsoft-intune-management) (for example, a user leaves, or the device is lost or stolen), it's likely that you will want to remove data from that device.

trans-unit.source: Intune provides a range of methods to ensure your company data remains secure.
trans-unit.target: Intune provides a range of methods to ensure your company data remains secure.

trans-unit.source: Require devices to be compliant
trans-unit.target: Require devices to be compliant

trans-unit.source: Intune features [device compliance policies](introduction-to-device-compliance-policies-in-microsoft-intune) that let you evaluate (and in some cases remediate) devices that are not compliant with rules you specify.
trans-unit.target: Intune features [device compliance policies](introduction-to-device-compliance-policies-in-microsoft-intune) that let you evaluate (and in some cases remediate) devices that are not compliant with rules you specify.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can report about iOS devices that are jailbroken, whether devices are encrypted, or whether Windows 10 devices are reported as healthy by the Health Attestation Service.
trans-unit.target: For example, you can report about iOS devices that are jailbroken, whether devices are encrypted, or whether Windows 10 devices are reported as healthy by the Health Attestation Service.

trans-unit.source: Protect apps and the data they use
trans-unit.target: Protect apps and the data they use

trans-unit.source: Intune gives you a range of features to help you protect apps and their data.
trans-unit.target: Intune gives you a range of features to help you protect apps and their data.

trans-unit.source: For example, mobile application management (MAM) policies can prevent data from being backed up from a protected app, restrict copy and paste to other apps, require a PIN to access an app, and more.
trans-unit.target: For example, mobile application management (MAM) policies can prevent data from being backed up from a protected app, restrict copy and paste to other apps, require a PIN to access an app, and more.

trans-unit.source: For more details about protecting apps, see [Protect apps and data with Microsoft Intune](protect-apps-and-data-with-microsoft-intune)
trans-unit.target: For more details about protecting apps, see [Protect apps and data with Microsoft Intune](protect-apps-and-data-with-microsoft-intune)

trans-unit.source: Further capabilities for Windows devices
trans-unit.target: Further capabilities for Windows devices

trans-unit.source: Add an additional layer of protection to Windows devices
trans-unit.target: Add an additional layer of protection to Windows devices

trans-unit.source: [Multi-factor authentication (MFA)](protect-windows-devices-with-multi-factor-authentication.md) is a more secure way of authenticating the users of Windows and Windows Phone devices on the network.
trans-unit.target: [Multi-factor authentication (MFA)](protect-windows-devices-with-multi-factor-authentication.md) is a more secure way of authenticating the users of Windows and Windows Phone devices on the network.

trans-unit.source: With MFA, users need to confirm their identity beyond user name and password, through a phone call, or text message.
trans-unit.target: With MFA, users need to confirm their identity beyond user name and password, through a phone call, or text message.

trans-unit.source: Control Windows Hello for Business settings on Windows devices
trans-unit.target: Control Windows Hello for Business settings on Windows devices

trans-unit.source: Intune lets you integrate with [Windows Hello for Business](control-microsoft-passport-settings-on-devices-with-microsoft-intune.md) (formerly Microsoft Passport) which is an alternative sign-in method for Windows 10 and later that uses Active Directory, or an Azure Active Directory account to replace a password, smart card, or virtual smart card.
trans-unit.target: Intune lets you integrate with [Windows Hello for Business](control-microsoft-passport-settings-on-devices-with-microsoft-intune.md) (formerly Microsoft Passport) which is an alternative sign-in method for Windows 10 and later that uses Active Directory, or an Azure Active Directory account to replace a password, smart card, or virtual smart card.

trans-unit.source: Further capabilities for iOS devices
trans-unit.target: Further capabilities for iOS devices

trans-unit.source: Bypass Activation Lock on iOS devices
trans-unit.target: Bypass Activation Lock on iOS devices

trans-unit.source: Activation Lock is a feature that help protect users' devices by requiring their Apple ID and password to be entered before anyone can erase, or reactivate the device.
trans-unit.target: Activation Lock is a feature that help protect users' devices by requiring their Apple ID and password to be entered before anyone can erase, or reactivate the device.

trans-unit.source: However, this can lead to problems, for example if the user leaves the company without removing the lock.
trans-unit.target: However, this can lead to problems, for example if the user leaves the company without removing the lock.

trans-unit.source: [iOS Activation Lock bypass](help-protect-ios-devices-with-activation-lock-bypass-for-microsoft-intune.md) can help by removing the lock from supervised iOS devices allowing you to reallocate, or erase them.
trans-unit.target: [iOS Activation Lock bypass](help-protect-ios-devices-with-activation-lock-bypass-for-microsoft-intune.md) can help by removing the lock from supervised iOS devices allowing you to reallocate, or erase them.

trans-unit.source: Protect Windows PCs managed with the Intune client
trans-unit.target: Protect Windows PCs managed with the Intune client

trans-unit.source: Intune continues to support security policies for Windows PCs that you don't enroll, but manage with the Intune computer client software.
trans-unit.target: Intune continues to support security policies for Windows PCs that you don't enroll, but manage with the Intune computer client software.

trans-unit.source: To find out how these policies can help you secure your Windows PCs, see [Use policies to help protect Windows PCs that run the Intune client software](policies-to-protect-windows-pcs-in-microsoft-intune.md).
trans-unit.target: To find out how these policies can help you secure your Windows PCs, see [Use policies to help protect Windows PCs that run the Intune client software](policies-to-protect-windows-pcs-in-microsoft-intune.md).
